levels.description: Attack range <@ba.vup>expands</>, gains <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</> ATK and <$ba.invisible>Invisibility</>, each attack grants <@ba.vup>{cost}</> DP and <$ba.steal>Steals</><@ba.vup>{attack@steal_atk_speed}</> ASPD from the target (Caps at {attack@steal_atk_speed_max}, lasts until skill ends or Ines is retreated)
